text:
Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner had an engagement party in New York City this weekend.

Tons of stars attended including model Ashley Graham, actor Ansel Elgort, and, of course, the rest of the Jonases.

The party featured a photo booth, leading to some inside snaps of the celebration.

Although Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner have kept their relationship pretty low-key — even announcing their recent engagement with a simple Instagram — they weren't shy about documenting their love over the past few days.

The couple celebrated their recent engagement over the weekend at Mamo restaurant in New York City. Based on Snapchats of the event, it looks like friends and family danced the night away and toasted to the couple.

Sophie dancing to Spice Girls "Wannabe" at the engagement party in NYC 😹🎉 A post shared by Sophie Turner (@thesophieturner) on Nov 5, 2017 at 8:16am PST Nov 5, 2017 at 8:16am PST

The party also featured a photobooth, and guests took advantage of the opportunity to capture the fun. (Editor's note: click through the Instagram posts for additional photos.)

Beautiful night celebrating beautiful people. #JOPHIE A post shared by Nick Jonas (@nickjonas) on Nov 5, 2017 at 9:01am PST Nov 5, 2017 at 9:01am PST

Joe's brothers and former band-mates, Nick and Kevin, were there, along with their brother Frankie, and Kevin's wife Danielle. The family took some sweet photos with the happy couple, and snapped some pics that made fans long for a Jonas Brothers reunion.

🤗😆😁😆😆😆😆😘😘😘😘😘 #Jophie #Jophie #Jophie A post shared by JinJoo 진주 (@jinjootheguitargirl) on Nov 5, 2017 at 5:25am PST Nov 5, 2017 at 5:25am PST

Joe's DNCE band-mate JinJoo Lee attended the party, snapping pics with several Jonases, Sophie, model Ashley Graham, actor Ansel Elgort, and more.

Congrats beautiful #Jophie 💘 A post shared by A S H L E Y G R A H A M (@theashleygraham) on Nov 5, 2017 at 6:18pm PST Nov 5, 2017 at 6:18pm PST

Graham, who starred in DNCE's video for "Toothbrush," attended with her husband Justin Ervin, who looked totally adorable in their photobooth snaps.

Epic couple. So happy for them and their engagement ❤️ A post shared by Ansel Elgort (@ansel) on Nov 5, 2017 at 10:17am PST Nov 5, 2017 at 10:17am PST

Elgort, Joe's long-time friend, shared a sweet snap of himself with the couple, dubbed #Jophie, with the caption "Epic couple. So happy for them and their engagement."

Although the couple is free to stay as private as they want, there's no denying that it was so fun to see these photos. Now if we could only score an invite to their likely epic wedding.
title: 'Game of Thrones' star Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas had a star-studded engagement party — here are the photos
